Class PhotoPost

java.lang.Object
  PhotoPost

public class PhotoPost
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores information about a post in a social network. The main part of the post consists of a photo and a caption. Other data, such as author and time, are also stored.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes

Parameters:

display

public java.lang.String display()
Display the details of this post. (Currently: Print to the text terminal. This is simulating display in a web browser for now.)

getCaption

public java.lang.String getCaption()
Return the caption of the image of this post.

Returns:

getImageFile

public java.lang.String getImageFile()
Return the file name of the image in this post.

Returns:
The post's image file name.

getTimeStamp

public long getTimeStamp()
Return the time of creation of this post.

Returns:
The post's creation time, as a system time value.

Record one more 'Like' indication from a user.

unlike

Record that a user has withdrawn his/her 'Like' vote.
